channel.title: Green-Bay-Packers on Sermon Archives
channel.description: Recent content in Green-Bay-Packers on Sermon Archives

item.title: What's the Church for?
item.description: Here is a handwritten midweek Lenten sermon from 1978. There’s even a reference to the Green Bay Packers in it! It’s written in blue ink with annotations in red pen.

item.title: A World of Widows
item.description: This is a typed sermon with some highlighting and underlining in yellow and red, as well as some corrections in blue pen. It is a sermon from 22 Pentecost and was preached in November of 1989. Technically, Luke 18 is now a part of 19 Pent C in the RCL.
